meanings.definition: A bacterium of a genus that includes the causative agents of tonsillitis and other infections.
meanings.sent1: The streptococci spread quickly in the body, causing illness.
meanings.sent2: Doctors identified streptococci as the bacteria responsible for the infection.
meanings.sent3: The streptococci decided to throw a party in the tonsils, causing quite a commotion.
meanings.sent4: The streptococci invaded the body like an army, attacking the tonsils with precision.
meanings.sent5: The image of streptococci multiplying rapidly in the throat was unsettling.

meanings.definition: Any bacterium of the genus Streptococcus.
meanings.sent1: She studied different types of streptococci in her microbiology class.
meanings.sent2: The lab technician identified the streptococci under the microscope.
meanings.sent3: The streptococci gathered for a tiny bacterial convention in the petri dish.
meanings.sent4: The streptococci in the culture seemed to dance under the lens of the microscope.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation made the concept of streptococci clearer than ever before.
